yewc.config.comment.structureType: The structure type ID to set (e.g. minecraft:swamp_hut)
yewc.config.comment.generateBuilding: Whether to generate the structure building
yewc.config.comment.openConfigGui: Hotkey to open the YEWC config GUI
yewc.config.comment.setStructure: Hotkey to set structure at current location
yewc.config.comment.clearStructure: Hotkey to clear structures at current location
yewc.config.comment.listStructures: Hotkey to list structures at current location
